strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
It's a fun weekend in Northwest Arkansas with plenty of fun options to help you celebrate this Father's Day and Juneteenth weekend!

  • 👩‍🎤 Off the rails: Railyard Live kicks off the weekend with The Red Lens, Protohive, and Kin & Co this Friday, Jun 16, then throws it back with a Madonna & Lady Gaga tribute on Saturday, Jun 17.
  • 🎷 Jazzy fresh: The Weekend Starts series continues at the Lower Ramble along the Razorback Greenway in Fayetteville with a jazz performance by the Coloring Twelve this Friday, Jun 16, at 5p.
  • 🚦Remembered: The City of Fayetteville will unveil a new historical marker and street renaming in honor of Nelson Hackett with a ceremony and live music celebration at the Pryor Center and Downtown Square this Friday, Jun 16, from 4-7:30p.
  • 😵‍💫 In your head: Brick & Mortar in Rogers will host comedian-magician-hypnotist Zachary Gibson for a mindblowing show this Friday, Jun 16, from 7:15-8:30p.
  • 🎹 It's Goin' Down: The 2023 Juneteenth Freedom Festival is this weekend, including performances by Bone Thugs-N-Harmony, Yung Joc, Funk Factory, and more, at Shiloh Square in Downtown Springdale on Saturday, June 17, from 1-9p.
  • 🛝 What a splash: Bentonville will celebrate the Grand Opening of Creekside Park with a ribbon-cutting event on Saturday, Jun 17, at 10a.
  • 🪕 I and Love and You: The heartfelt folk sound of The Avett Brothers will fill the Walmart AMP as they take the stage with opener Gov't Mule this Saturday, Jun 17 — gates open at 6p, and the tunes kick off at 7:30p.
  • ❤️ Party's pumpin': Paint the Town Red with the American Heart Association at JJ's Live for a Country themed event featuring a live DJ, food prepared by 15 local restaurants, and more this Saturday, Jun 17, at 7p.
  • 🚴 Get stoked: Buddy Pegs and bicycle innovators Gnargo Bikes are hosting a Kidical Mass Ride from Bentonville to Rogers and back this Saturday, Jun 17, from 9a-12p.
  • 🔨 Smashing good time: The newly opened Breakroom NWA in Rogers is running a BOGO 50% off deal for dads with coupon code DAD50 this Sunday, Jun 18, from 2-6p.
  • ⚾ Defenders of the Diamond: The Naturals host a homes series this weekend, complete with a Fireworks Friday, Marvel Theme Night, and Father's Day T-Shirt giveaway, Jun 16-18.
  • 🪓 Chip chop: Dads throw free all weekend at Ozark Axe House in Rogers, along with several fun giveaways! Book your reservation with Promo Code DADDAY.

Have a great weekend, NWA!
